author: jochembrouwer
content:
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7607

Is the Fusaka meta EIP correct? We currently have TXCREATE and Creation transaction SFId there but I had the idea that those EIPs were supposed to be swapped for each other?

author: _shemnon
content: The final form only has one.  Once we hit all our devet-1 targets the contract 7698 will be formally withdrawn.  Hitting all the marks includes a working TXCREATE precompile.

author: _shemnon
content: i.e. don't remove stuff until the replacement is working.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ah right that makes sense. (TXCREATE precompile you mean the evm creator contract?)

author: jochembrouwer
content: I want to signal that EthJS is currently working on the latest EOF additions (TXCREATE / PAY) and we are also working on trace-based testing support so we can join the fuzzing! ðŸ™‚
